title: Japan's top manufacturer of selective soldering equipment - The Worldfolio
summary: The article discusses Japan's manufacturing sector facing challenges due to an aging population, highlights the company's strategic partnerships and plans for overseas expansion, and emphasizes its focus on developing innovative soldering equipment.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 333249 - Other Industrial Machinery Manufacturing, 334413 - Semiconductor and Other Electronic Component Manufacturing, 334515 - Instrument Manufacturing for Measuring and Testing Electricity and Electrical Signals, 335999 - All Other Miscellaneous Electrical Equipment and Component Manufacturing
